name: serologist

a scientist who studies blood and other fluids from the body: The forensic serologist will be able to say where the blood came from.
More examplesFewer examplesAs a police serologist, his job was to match their blood to samples found at the scene of the crime.PGM is one of the enzymes examined by serologists.Bryce was appointed bacteriologist and serologist to the Royal Melbourne Hospital in 1928. The serologist works with a kit to collect evidence.
